info.title: Jentic Generated Arazzo Specification
info.description: Automatically generated Arazzo specification from OpenAPI

workflows.summary: Allows a user to search for districts based on various criteria (state, city, zip, proximity) and then retrieve comprehensive details for a specific district found in the search results.
workflows.description: Allows a user to search for districts based on various criteria (state, city, zip, proximity) and then retrieve comprehensive details for a specific district found in the search results.

steps.description: Search the SchoolDigger database for districts using specified criteria.
Retrieve a single, detailed district record using its ID.

workflows.summary: Enables a user to search for schools using various filters (state, name, district, level, city, zip, type, proximity) and then access detailed information for a chosen school from the search results.
workflows.description: Enables a user to search for schools using various filters (state, name, district, level, city, zip, type, proximity) and then access detailed information for a chosen school from the search results.

steps.description: Search the SchoolDigger database for schools using specified criteria.
Retrieve a single, detailed school record using its ID.

workflows.summary: Provides a way to browse ranked districts for a given state and then drill down into the comprehensive details of a specific district from the ranking list.
workflows.description: Provides a way to browse ranked districts for a given state and then drill down into the comprehensive details of a specific district from the ranking list.

steps.description: Retrieve a list of ranked districts for a specified state and year.
Retrieve detailed information for a district selected from the ranking list.

workflows.summary: Allows users to view ranked schools by state and level (Elementary, Middle, High), and then retrieve comprehensive details for a selected school from the ranking list.
workflows.description: Allows users to view ranked schools by state and level (Elementary, Middle, High), and then retrieve comprehensive details for a selected school from the ranking list.

steps.description: Retrieve a list of ranked schools for a specified state, year, and level.
Retrieve detailed information for a school selected from the ranking list.

workflows.summary: Allows a user to find schools that include a specific U.S. address in their attendance boundary (Enterprise API level) and then retrieve detailed information for a selected school.
workflows.description: Allows a user to find schools that include a specific U.S. address in their attendance boundary (Enterprise API level) and then retrieve detailed information for a selected school.

steps.description: Search for schools whose attendance boundary includes a specified address or geographic coordinates.
Retrieve detailed information for a school identified by the address-based search.

workflows.summary: Allows a user to find districts that include a specific U.S. address in their attendance boundary (Enterprise API level) and then retrieve detailed information for a selected district.
workflows.description: Allows a user to find districts that include a specific U.S. address in their attendance boundary (Enterprise API level) and then retrieve detailed information for a selected district.

steps.description: Search for districts whose attendance boundary includes a specified address or geographic coordinates.
Retrieve detailed information for a district identified by the address-based search.

workflows.summary: Enables a user to first search for and identify a school district, and then find all schools that belong to that specific district.
workflows.description: Enables a user to first search for and identify a school district, and then find all schools that belong to that specific district.

steps.description: Search for a district by name, city, or zip code.
Retrieve a list of schools associated with the identified district.

workflows.summary: Allows a user to search for a school and then retrieve its attendance boundary data, which can be used for mapping or geographic analysis.
workflows.description: Allows a user to search for a school and then retrieve its attendance boundary data, which can be used for mapping or geographic analysis.

steps.description: Search for schools to identify one for which to retrieve boundary information.
Retrieve the detailed record of the selected school, including its attendance boundary polyline.

workflows.summary: Allows a user to search for a district and then retrieve its attendance boundary data, which can be used for mapping or geographic analysis.
workflows.description: Allows a user to search for a district and then retrieve its attendance boundary data, which can be used for mapping or geographic analysis.

steps.description: Search for districts to identify one for which to retrieve boundary information.
Retrieve the detailed record of the selected district, including its attendance boundary polyline.
